original_text: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand, even four things: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand, even four things: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand, even four things: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand, even four things: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand, even four things:
korean_text: 내가 심히 기이히 여기고도 깨닫지 못하는 것 서넛이 있나니

sentences.original_text: There are three things that are too difficult for me to understand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이해하기에 너무 어려운 세 가지 일이 있습니다
